#id=1
#text=This morning , I went to the grocery store to pick up some food .
#id=2
#text=I got a grocery cart and walked in the store .
#id=3
#text=I looked at the sales that were advertised in the front of the store .
#id=4
#text=Luckily , I saw that carrots were on sale , which was good because I needed to buy carrots .
#id=5
#text=I walked to the produce section and located the carrots .
#id=6
#text=I also picked up some pineapple , oranges , apples , and broccoli from the produce section .
#id=7
#text=I walked over to the dry goods and selected some chicken noodle soup and spaghetti sauce from the shelf .
#id=8
#text=I remembered that I also needed some milk , so I walked to the refrigerator area , opened the case , and selected low-fat milk .
#id=9
#text=As I was walking to the register , I passed the yogurt and decided to buy a few cartons of yogurt as well .
#text=I walked to the register and waited in line to pay .
#text=When I reached the front of the line , I greeted the cashier while she rang up my food items .
#text=I gave the cashier the money to purchase my food and left the grocery store with my bags in my hands .
